QuestData.Title: The Arcanic Oubliette
QuestData.Description: An Alliance member? Here? Elune be praised.$b$bMy team has encountered a snag. We opened a portal to this land using some ancient scrolls we had found that predated Azshara's rule.$b$bUnfortunately, the coordinates provided on the tablets were warded and the portal that meant to take us to our destination landed us in this oubliette.$b$bWe have been trapped here for days, and it is slowly leaching our energies to power itself.$b$bCan you find the nearby shackles that bind the oubliette and disable them?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: His voice echoes in your mind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and disable the 3 Oubliette Shackles.
QuestData.RewardText: Fabulous! Your timing was impeccable. Another day in there and I think we would have wasted away to nothing.$b$bNow we can continue our search for the Pools of Youth!
